TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant brought an action against a limited liability company before GPE , requesting the court to order the respondent to pay him fee for using his real estate .

CARDINAL . ORG suspended the proceedings on CARDINAL occasions for DATE , pending the outcome of separate legal disputes related to the ownership of the real estate . The applicant ’s requests to have the proceedings resumed were dismissed .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG delivered judgment , finding partly for the applicant . In the absence of appeals , the judgment became final on DATE .
